import { Component } from 'react' import { mapStateToProps, mapDispatchToProps, cookies, cookieDecoder } from '../../app/functions' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import { withRouter } from 'react-router-dom' import { Navbar, Nav, NavDropdown } from 'react-bootstrap' import { Props, State, Path } from '../../interface/Interfaces' class Navigation extends Component { private appName: string = 'DOMAS' private path: Path = { index: '/', login: '/login', profil: '/profil', info: '/info' } constructor(props: Props){ super(props) this.state = {} } componentDidMount = () => { const decode = cookieDecoder() this.setState({ path: decode!.username }) } logOut = (): void => { this.props.reset() cookies.remove('token') cookies.remove('refreshToken') this.props.history.push('/') } userLogedIn = (isLogin: boolean): JSX.Element => { const { dataLogin } = this.props.persist return isLogin === false ? <> Data Info Action Another action Something Login : <> { dataLogin.username } Statistik desa Data Input Data { this.state.path } Another action Value Logout } render = (): JSX.Element => { const { isLogin } = this.props.persist return (
{ this.appName } Website
{ this.userLogedIn(isLogin) }
) } } export default withRouter(connect(mapStateToProps, mapDispatchToProps)(Navigation))
